entries.meaning: (countable) An arrangement, categorization or classification of things.

definitionGroups.group: (countable) A disposing of or getting rid of something.

entries.meaning: (countable, Australian rules football) A kick or a handball of the ball during a game.
examples: Lewy Taylor was quiet against the Swans with just seven disposals but hit the mark with a couple of kicks inside 50 during the crucial last quarter.

entries.meaning: (uncountable) The power to use something or someone.
